byline.contributor: David Jolly reported from Kabul, and Taimoor Shah from Kandahar, Afghanistan. Mujib Mashal contributed reporting from Kabul.
byline.original: By DAVID JOLLY and TAIMOOR SHAH

abstract: Taliban suicide bombers kill nine people at Kandahar Airfield in Afghanistan.
lead_paragraph: Afghan officials said at least nine people were killed and 15 wounded, most of them civilian shop owners, after battles between Afghan soldiers and Taliban insurgents at Kandahar Airfield.

headline.main: At Least 9 Killed as Taliban Suicide Bombers Attack Kandahar Base
headline.print_headline: Taliban Insurgents Kill 9 at Kandahar Base

snippet: Afghan officials said at least nine people were killed and 15 wounded, most of them civilian shop owners, after battles between Afghan soldiers and Taliban insurgents at Kandahar Airfield.

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
